import productList from "./productList"; import React, { useState } from "react"; const App = () => { const [filteredProductList, setFilteredProductList] = useState(productList); const [filterName, setFilterName] = useState(""); const [filterCategory, setFilterCategory] = useState(""); const [filterPrice, setFilterPrice] = useState(""); const randomItem = Math.floor(Math.random() * filteredProductList.length); const promotedProduct = productList[randomItem]; promotedProduct.newPrice = Math.round(parseInt(promotedProduct.price.substring(1)) / 2); const today = new Date(); const monthNames = [ "January", "February", "March", "April", "May", "June", "July", "August", "September", "October", "November", "December", ]; const monthName = monthNames[today.getMonth()]; const formatedDate = `${today.getDate()} ${monthName}`; function filterProducts() {} return ( <>
setFilterName(event.target.value)} placeholder="Product name" />
Total bought items:

Don't miss today's hot deal!

{promotedProduct.name}

{promotedProduct.shortDescription}

{promotedProduct.price}

${promotedProduct.newPrice} only on {formatedDate}

Buy now
{filteredProductList.map((product) => (

{product.name}

{product.description}

{product.price}

Add to cart
))}

We bring you only the best products that can be randomly generated!

Content from faker.js with images from{" "} Lorem Picsum

); }; export default App;
